snippet: The trial of President Dési Bouterse in the killings of 15 political opponents must resume despite an amnesty law, Suriname’s high court has ruled.
abstract: Suriname's high court rules trial of Pres Desi Bouterse in killings of 15 political opponents in 1982 must resume despite amnesty law.
lead_paragraph: The trial of President Dési Bouterse in the killings of 15 political opponents must resume despite an amnesty law, Suriname’s high court has ruled.

headline.main: Suriname: Judges Say President’s Trial Over Killings in 1982 Should Continue
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Suriname: Judges Say President’s Trial Over Killings in 1982 Should Continue
